title: sri harE
sahitya:
shrI harE padmanAbha dalita madhukaiTabha pAhimAm payOdAbha sUrakOTi prashObha

anupallavi

 mOhanatarAkAra mOha lObhAdihara mOhinI rUpAntara mOhita gangAdhara

caraNam

 naravara nArAyaNa natajana parAyaNa narakAsura bhISaNa narashOka shOSaNa 
varaguNa tribhuvana sharaNa vArijEkSaNa varada vana tulasI bhUSaNa shrI pOSaNa
